title: [Caffe2]How to set lr_mult and decay_mult in Conv layer?
body_html:
In facebookresearch/detectron, I see a conv layer is add by:

conv_rpn_fpn = model.Conv(
bl_in,
'conv_rpn_fpn' + slvl,
dim_in,
dim_out,
kernel=3,
pad=1,
stride=1,
weight_init=gauss_fill(0.01),
bias_init=const_fill(0.0)
)

However, I don't find any parameter statement about lr_mult and decay_mult like that in a caffe conv layer. Could you please give me an example? Thanks a lot!
